description: I'm a backend-focused full-stack developer with 1+ year of experience building secure, scalable APIs, custom CRM systems, and integrating third-party platforms like Meta & Exotel using PHP, Laravel, and Slim Framework.

While my strength lies in backend logic and database handling, I also enjoy working with frontend tools like React to build seamless user interfaces. I believe in clean code, continuous learning, and solving real-world problems with technology.

responsibilities: Designed and developed RESTful APIs using PHP, Slim, and Laravel for ERP systems
Integrated third-party platforms like Meta Graph API,Mcube, MagicBrick, Exotel, ...
Collaborated with frontend developers to connect APIs with React interfaces and ensure seamless data flow
Taught undergraduate students core computer science subjects including DBMS, Web Programming, and Software Engineering
Guided students on final year academic projects and provided technical mentorship
Prepared course materials, assignments, and conducted lab sessions with practical hands-on training
Created models for User, Blog, OTP verification, Roles, and Categories ensuring normalized and efficient data retrieval
Developed RESTful APIs for blog interaction including like, dislike, comment, share, and report functionalities
Built a robust email verification system using Nodemailer for secure OTP-based user authentication
